title: Update Ad Creative in a Live Campaign
description: An ad creative is experiencing fatigue (declining performance). A manager needs to swap it out with a new one.

tasks.description: Identify the underperforming ad creative in the campaign.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the ad with the declining CTR.
Agent successfully pauses the fatigued ad.

tasks.description: Create a new ad within the same ad set using the new creative assets.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully uploads and launches the new ad.
